name: Operad
tag_list: internet-marketing, seo, ppc, adwords, cro, sem, online-marketing
overview:
Operad is a search & online marketing company that specializes in SEO, PPC, CRO, internet strategies consulting and other creative online marketing methods, specializing in various verticals like Saas, software downloads, fashion, diamonds and more.

Based out of Israel, Operad has created relationships and is helping clients such as with their online presence. Being conversion oriented, the methodology and strategy is focused on conversions and ROI. Operad connects to the clients’ final goal and measures success by these goals - sales, leads, online presence or brand awareness.
